Producer: Michael Bay, Andrew Form, Brad Fuller, Jason Blum, Bennett Schneir
Rating: PG-13 (Frightening Horror Images|Disturbing Violent Content|Thematic Material)
Synopsis: Following the sudden death of her best friend, Debbie, Laine finds an antique Ouija board in Debbie's room and tries to use it to say goodbye. Instead, she makes contact with a spirit that calls itself DZ. As strange events begin to occur, Laine enlists others to help her determine DZ's identity and what it wants. As the friends delve deeper, they find that Debbie's mysterious death was not unique, and that they will suffer the same fate unless they learn how to close the portal they've opened.
Title: Ouija
